content: ribbed scarf materials list 24 oz chocolate worsted weight yarn size j crochet hook row 1 chain 201 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in each chain across chain 1 200 single_crochet row 2-25 working in back loop only single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 1 turn finish off after row 25 weave in loose ends every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these instructions we cannot be responsible for human error differences in individual stitching techniques or typographical errors copyright 2007 c l halvorson
